articles.author: Chris Scullion
articles.title: Gallery: Here's how every WWE 2K24 wrestler looks compared to 2K23 | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: Our huge comparison gallery shows the upgrades (or lack of them) made to 194 superstars’…
articles.content:
WWE 2K24 is out this week, and as our review suggests, it’s worth a purchase if you’re a wrestling fan.
One thing the review does point out, however, is that the game feels more like an evolution th… [+9830 chars]
